actions.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (UT) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment added to the study an assessment of any impact a wild and scenic designation in the study area is likely to have on energy production, transmission or conveyance.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-834 to amend the bill by adding to the proposed study an assessment of any impact a wild and scenic designation in the study area is likely to have on energy production, transmission or conveyance.
